Articles.Content:
Could not figure out why I could not hit Duna after my main burn... turns out I keep getting intercepted by the Mun... get out of my way!

Not sure how much Dv I've lost to it, but I'm now attempting a second burn, but I'll have to wait for another window (as I've missed this one by too far).

Have you had any planets or moons get in your way?
I was sending a crew of 3 out to Eeloo when the flight ended abruptly whilst I was time warping. Turns out I had crashed into Minmus of all things...
The Mun got in my way on a Duna burn as well. I tried to blow it up, but it just ignored my huge rocketbomb. I'm rebuilding something even bigger. I'll teach it to get in my way!
I had the Mun get in the way when I was trying to set up a Minmus transfer. All you can do is wait.

I had the Mun get in the way when I was trying to set up a Minmus transfer. All you can do is wait.

No! I say we take action! Let's rally to the cause of destroying the evil Mun!

I was sending a crew of 3 out to Eeloo when the flight ended abruptly whilst I was time warping. Turns out I had crashed into Minmus of all things...

That makes my attempt sound better. Thanks.

The Kerbals got to their destination with 2 spare tanks of fuel after all. I knew bringing extra was worth it.

One time I sent a lander out towards Minmus, but the Mun got in the way of my transfer, so I put the lander on the Mun instead. Then I took off and sent it to Minmus anyway.

That showed it who's boss.

having the Mun in the way can actually help you by saving some delta-v, but if you're planning your burn using maneuver nodes, I suggest you set the conic patch limit higher than 3 in the settings file.

The Mun got in my way on a Duna burn as well. I tried to blow it up, but it just ignored my huge rocketbomb. I'm rebuilding something even bigger. I'll teach it to get in my way!

Poke it with a stick!!

HOW TO POKE WITH STICK:

1. Stick some of the long truss pieces (can't remember the name at the moment) on top of a command pod

2. Crash it into the mun truss first

3. Poof, the mun is gone

in 0.18

While going to jool i got captured by duna and got flung outta the system
During Heavy Time Warp to Duna Encounter, Kerbin catched up behind my back and pulled me in, while i was still wondering why time-warp didnt worked, I was flying right into the sea :/

During Heavy Time Warp to Duna Encounter, Kerbin catched up behind my back and pulled me in, while i was still wondering why time-warp didnt worked, I was flying right into the sea :/

Ha Ha,

Kerbin: "Pfft, those Kerbals. I raise and care for them under my own Biosphere for thousands of years and this is how they re-pay me? You WILL not go to space today *grab*"

No! I say we take action! Let's rally to the cause of destroying the evil Mun!

I'd vote for de-orbiting it, but sadly it isn't possible.
